name: ListMetricTagConfigurations
description:
Retrieve all metrics configurable in Datadog's Metrics Summary.

Use this tool to get a list of all metrics that can be configured on the Metrics Summary page or with Metrics without Limits™. It supports pagination through cursor-based navigation.

parameters.name: filter_tag_configurations
parameters.description: Filter tag configurations by specified configured tags. Use string values representing specific criteria for filtering.

value_schema.description: Filter tag configurations by configured tags.

parameters.name: metric_type_filter
parameters.description: Filter metrics by type. Options are 'non_distribution' or 'distribution'.

value_schema.description: Filter metrics by metric type.

parameters.name: filter_metrics_by_tags
parameters.description: Filter metrics by tags using boolean/wildcard expressions; combine with queried filter only.

value_schema.description:
Filter metrics that have been submitted with the given tags. Supports boolean and wildcard expressions.
Can only be combined with the filter[queried] filter.

parameters.name: look_back_seconds
parameters.description: The number of seconds to look back for applying a filter on tags or queried metrics. Defaults to 3600 seconds (1 hour) with a max of 2,592,000 seconds (30 days).

value_schema.description:
The number of seconds of look back (from now) to apply to a filter[tag] or filter[queried] query.
Default value is 3600 (1 hour), maximum value is 2,592,000 (30 days).

parameters.name: max_results_per_page
parameters.description: Maximum number of metric configurations to return per page.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of results returned.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: String to query the next page of metric results. Use 'next_cursor' from the previous response. Null when all pages are retrieved.

value_schema.description:
String to query the next page of results.
This key is provided with each valid response from the API in `meta.pagination.next_cursor`.
Once the `meta.pagination.next_cursor` key is null, all pages have been retrieved.

parameters.name: include_metrics_with_configured_tags
parameters.description: Set to true to filter and include only custom metrics with configured tags.

value_schema.description: Filter custom metrics that have configured tags.

parameters.name: include_percentile_aggregations
parameters.description: Set to true to include distributions with additional percentile aggregations enabled. Set to false to exclude them.

value_schema.description:
Filter distributions with additional percentile
aggregations enabled or disabled.

parameters.name: filter_by_query_status
parameters.description: Filter custom metrics that have or have not been queried within the specified time window.

value_schema.description:
(Preview) Filter custom metrics that have or have not been queried in the specified window[seconds].
If no window is provided or the window is less than 2 hours, a default of 2 hours will be applied.

parameters.name: filter_metrics_used_in_assets
parameters.description: Boolean to filter metrics used in dashboards, monitors, notebooks, and SLOs.

value_schema.description: (Preview) Filter metrics that are used in dashboards, monitors, notebooks, SLOs.
